reviews.review: The humor is on point, the puzzles are just difficult enough,, and it's more than 2 hours long!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

Talking about this game without mentioning it's predecessor is difficult. Because of this, I took the liberty of forgetting everything I know about the first game, all 300 hours of me playing and speedrunning it, and all 80 hours of me speedrunning the campaign of this game, and played through it as blind as possible.

The best parts about this game are it's story and dialogue. The graphics are good but you can't really compare it to anything because there's really nothing like it on this build of the Source engine besides CS:GO, but that game doesn't really look good compared to this. Great nonetheless.

I won't go through the story because it's too long to read. If you're doubting your purchase, wait until it's on sale or watch some videos, preferably not about the solo or co-op campaigns in order to not have the story ruined. I recommend watching videos on the custom chambers/stories because they add so much to the game thanks to the built in authoring tools you get, both built into the game and the seperate Hammer editor, the same editor used to make the maps in the story.

Throughout the game, you are put into some scenarios that require you to do some ninja moves, such as [spoiler] facing GLaDOS where the first core transfer happens [/spoiler] and [spoiler] the ending fight to do the second and final core transfer [/spoiler] (if you don't want the game spoiled don't look) but they're not really insane ninja moves. There's really no high difficulty to this. When I played through it the first time on XBox, I completed the game in a few combined hours, longer than PC because of controller issues. It's really not hard and that may be a turn off for the campaign, but custom chambers fix that difficulty itch.

The writers of this game deserve awards. I'm serious. The dialogue is the best in any campaign I've played, and yes, that's including GTA V. The dialogue alone for me was worth the $19.99 I spend on this game, twice (I have this game for XBox and PC).

Challenge mode is back from the first game but without "Least Steps," a challenging, careful, movement based challenge that made the game a real challenge outside the real game. But, at least the game now includes the challenge in one try. If you want to do a fast, least portals run, instead of timing that run seperately, you can run it and if you get a faster time than your run where you didn't care about the amount of portals used, it overwrites your time even though you were going for least portals. It's a time and pain saver. Bring back advanced challenges though.

That's all I'm going to say. If you want more, watch some videos, wait for a sale or a coupon, or just get the game, it's true it's one of the best games, if not, the best sequel to a game ever made.
Не плохое продолжение оригинала, с прикольным сюжетом. Рекомендую!
Самая классная логическая игра. В карпоративе иногда мозг взрывается. )))

Possible the best puzzle game ever made. From the rich story and the funny characters, to the difficult challenges and the fun coop. This game even has a workshop to create and play custom levels! 10/10 must buy.

Portal 2 kombiniert, besser noch als der Vorgänger, interessante Level mit inovativen Spielelementen und bietet so die reinste Freude für alle Knobelfans. Dazu kommt eine witzige, wendungsreiche und interessante Story  die einem unbemerkt mehrere Stunden fesselt. Wer Portal 1 gespielt hat, wird hier dran doppelte Freude haben.
A puzzle game every player should play, a great follow through from the first game.

Science isn't about why, it's about why not. Do your part! Join Aperture Laboratories today and become a testsubject. If you manage to avoid the mantis men, asbestos and having your blood turned into gasoline, you'll have the time of your life!
The Best Game (2011)

Qeympley sadəcə mükəmməl! Elmi, fantastika və az qala mümkün olmayan reallığın miksi. Bu nədir? İzah etmək mümkün deyil. Hər-halda lokasiyalar, səslər, mühit... Oyun zamanı sənə yol göstərən işarələr, səndən əvvəlkilərin qalıqları... Kimlər olub onlar? Azadlıq uğrunda mücadilə! Daima! Bütün bunlar qeympleyə xüsusi ab-hava qatır. Oyunun ən əla cəhətlərindən biri nəhəng və sirli kompleksin fonunda kiçik, haradasa aciz görünməyin və bu hissin oyunun sonuna kimi səndən əl çəkməməyidir! 

Bilirsiniz, mən sadəcə Sizə bu oyunu ALIB, oynamağınızı məsləhət görürəm. Bir sözlə Portal 2 özünün inanılmaz mühiti, mükəmməl saundtrekləri, istifadə olunan qara yumor, balaca Uitli və əvəzolunmaz GLaDOS-u ilə mənim oyun kolleksiyamda qızıl yer tutdu.

Özünün həqiqətən böyük olan süjet xəttinə baxmayaraq (6 saatdan-14 saatadək) mənim üçün bu az idi! Əlim elə “New Game”-ə uzanır, qulağım isə ağıllı tapmacalar və personajların sanki ülgüc kimi iti reprikalarını yenidən dinləmək istəyirdi. Hər dəfə yenidən baş qəhrəmanın inanılmaz inadkarlığını görmək, sonda oxunan və ötürülməsi sadəcə mümkün olmayan mükəmməl saundtreki dinləmək istəyirəm. Mən Portal 2-ni video oyun mədəniyyətində çox dərin iz buraxdığını hesab edirəm. Hamınıza qravitopdan heç olmasa bir dəfə də olsun atmağı arzulayıram ;). 

Mütləq alın!

Что может быть лучше Portal? Конечно же Portal 2! Однозначно лучшая, на сегодняшний день, игра в жанре «головоломка от первого лица». Сюжетная линия одиночной игры пополняется ещё одним действующим лицом, теперь их, помимо Челл, целых два (четыре/шесть?). Казалось бы, зачем ещё один, когда есть [b]ГЛэДОС[/b]? Об этом вы узнаете практически сразу, как только начнёте игру (вы ещё тут?). А так же узнаете историю основания Aperture Science (и не только это). Ну, а что на счёт юмора - спросите вы? Фирменный юмор (и не только чёрный) никуда не делся, лишь приумножился. Головоломки стали ещё интереснее, ещё разнообразнее, [strike]ещё смертельнее[/strike] - кто вписал сюда это? Звуковое сопровождение, как и в Portal (this was a triumph) - на высоте (I'm making a note here: huge success). Как только одиночный режим будет пройден, не убирайте далеко портальную пушку, ведь в игре присутствует полноценный кооперативный режим с собственной сюжетной веткой, с собственными комнатами испытаний (со всеми вытекающими отсюда последствиями). В коопе игра раскрывает свой потенциал на все 100%. Так что хватаем друга/родственника/первого встречного и бегом в лабораторию, наука не ждёт (без шуток)!
P.S. Ну, а для тех, кто согласился на впрыскивание ДНК богомола, у меня есть хорошие и плохие новости...
Portal 2, what else do I have to say ;-)
Who are we kidding?  You've all played it, it's awesome.
Great game. Good story. Good puzzles. Good characters. Good humor. And you are flying through portals like an eagle piloting a blimp.

Народ!!! Мне очень скучно без вас играть в Portal 2. Конечно с вами бы было лучше чем с иностранцем, но скажу вам что с Немцами играть тоже прикольно, хотя не так весело как с вами. Я вас жду!!!!

正如其首發價達到了一個『大作』的標準，其內容也確實配得上這個規格，把這個遊戲提升到了一個新的高度。初代遊戲雖然展現出了獨特的創意，但走的還是一個『小遊戲』的路子，一個接一個的實驗室，最後逃脫，略顯單調，整個流程也偏短。二代則給人耳目一新的感覺，有了更加曲折的剧情和更加生动的人物塑造。BOSS戰雖然還是比較簡單，但最後感覺碉堡了，不像一代結束得太過平淡。此外新增的合作模式獨立關卡（支持聯機和本地雙手柄）和創意工房自創實驗室也大大提高了遊戲的可玩性。
Pour se retourner le cerveau avec le sourire.

Sólo lo puedo describir como "perfecto".

Conserva esa jugabilidad que combina acción y lógica en infinidad de nuevos mapas y más contenido en general, muchas horas de juego. Los nuevos personajes son fantásticos (me quedo con Wheatley), la banda sonora es magnífica y el argumento no es solamente increíble si no que, en mi opinión, es el mejor argumento de toda la historia de los videojuegos. Puede que no consiga ese ambienta tan heroico y espectacular que logró Valve con su antecesor Half-Life, pero es el micro-clima de caos y orden lo que enamora de Portal 2.

El lado del online y el trade todavía está en proceso pero, ¿qué queda decir? No puedes morir sin haberlo jugado. 

10/10
A mio avviso il miglior gioco degli ultimi 10 anni. Anche se breve, è talmente ricco di particolari nascosti che ogni volta che si rigioca si scopre qualcosa di nuovo.

Expands on the original Portal formula adding some new tricks. Gameplay still remains similar to the original, although in the sequel, the campaign is certainly more of a full game. High production values make sure the game has excellent graphics and sound. Its got humour and at times feels like you're playing through a Pixar film. Still, overall I think the game is somewhat over-rated. If you enjoyed the first Portal, the sequel is bigger and better, but if you didn't find the first game that special, I don't think the sequel will change your mind.

The story is quite fun and the dialogue is great, but most of the chambers are fairly easy. There were only 1 or 2 that were stumpers for more than 5 minutes. Glad I held off on release and only paid 4.99 for it.

"Perfekt". So würde ich Portal 2 in einem Wort beschreiben.

Portal 2 ist meiner Meinung nach eines der besten oder vielleicht sogar das beste Spiel das ich je spielen durfte. Die Einzelspieler-Kampangne ist absolut genial und knüpft perfekt an die Geschichte des ersten Teils der Portal-Serie an. Witzige Dialoge, umwerfende Gameplay-Elemente und das Portal-Prinzip ist ja an sich schon fantastisch und bringt frischen Wind in das Puzzle-Genre. Auch die Co-op-Story ist makellos, und die Tatsache, dass man von diesem absolut brillianten Spielprinzip nun auch gemeinsam Gebrauch machen kann, ist atemberaubend.
Es ist nicht übertrieben, zu sagen, dass dieses Spiel mit all seinen Aspekten vollends überzeugen kann. Ich danke Valve, den Entwicklern, die mit diesem Computerspiel ein weiteres Meisterwerk geschaffen haben.

Es darf auch nicht unerwähnt bleiben, dass es fast schon eine Pflicht ist, den Vorgänger Portal zu spielen. Zum einen, weil man so die Story versteht, und zum anderen, um auch in Genuss dieses tollen Puzzle-Shooters zu kommen.

Abschließend ist zu sagen, dass ich jedem Gamer Portal 2 empfehle, weil es einfach in keiner Spielesammlung fehlen darf. :)

Portal 2 is a classic, hands down.

Two story lines to follow, one is the singleplayer path, the story of a single girl trying to escape the dark and mysterious chambers of an abandoned laboritory, all while being watch by a crazy killer robot leaving traps for her behind every corner. Or, you can play Co-Op with a friend. Explore the same labs, but many generations later. You and your robo buddy are being tested to see if you're ready for some kind of greater task, but what?

Overall, Portal 2 was one of the very first Valve games I played, and is easily one of my favorites. It goes on sale often, so I'd recommend you pick up a copy during sales.

Not only do you get a gorgeously looking game, the soundtrack, the writing, the gameplay, the level editor, the multiplayer, everything about this game is purely amazing. I definitely recommend this to everyone!

Portal 2 - it is masterfully crafted. The voicework is the best I've ever heard. The premise is a refreshing continuation of the original. The gameplay feels too assisted in some parts, but that's understandable considering the stead increase in puzzle difficulty. Hidden rooms and messages, subtle pop culture references, and absurdist humor make this game the best semi-casual first person experience you can have. Oh yeah - I should mention that all of the above applies to the co-op game as well, which has its own separate storyline!
Awesome game, it'll have you laughing the whole time!
